flawed_nl_solution:
Before Samuel walked across the porch, there were 331 - 223 = <<331-223=107>>107 dust particles.
Those 107 were 1/10 of the original amount, so there were 107 * 10 = <<107*10=1070>>1070 dust particles on the porch before Samuel swept.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 108, not 107. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
